And that's something I'm paying very close attention to because that is the exact kind of condition where my entire investment strategy would literally flip overnight if that happens. So I'm waiting to see the way it goes. Again, the way to think about markets as a trader is that we never know what's going to happen, but we have to have an idea of what we would do in different scenarios based on the broader context of what the world is doing. And so that we're not caught off guard because I can tell you exactly what would happen to the majority of retail traders who are kind of passively involved. If that war escalated, they do not have a playbook ready on what they would do. And it would take them a couple days to get their feet under them to figure out what to do with the portfolio as it sits to try to find new opportunities. And by that point, you are late to the dance. So anyways, all of that is an encouragement for you to prepare yourself. And again, we're not I'm not preparing myself for something that I view
